Literature.Title: An adamantyl amino acid containing gramicidin S analogue with broad spectrum antibacterial activity and reduced hemolytic activity.
Literature.Author: Kapoerchan VV, Knijnenburg AD, Niamat M, Spalburg E, de Neeling AJ, Nibbering PH, Mars-Groenendijk RH, Noort D, Otero JM, Llamas-Saiz AL, van Raaij MJ, van der Marel GA, Overkleeft HS, Overhand M

Literature.Title: Tuning hydrophobicity of highly cationic tetradecameric Gramicidin S analogues using adamantane amino acids.
Literature.Author: Knijnenburg AD, Kapoerchan VV, Spalburg E, de Neeling AJ, Mars-Groenendijk RH, Noort D, van der Marel GA, Overkleeft HS, Overhand M

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=107±1.07 µM,Human erythrocytes:100% Hemolysis=500 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=4µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=8µg/ml),Bacillus cereus ATCC 11778(MIC=8µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=16µg/ml),Proteus mirabilis 1190901236(MIC=>64µg/ml),Enterobacter cloacae 1190900252(MIC=8µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae 1190901525(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus 1110301981HT034-PVL+(MIC=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus N229-T034-PVL-(MIC=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus N133-T034-PVL-(MIC=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus USA 300-1110301146 PVL+(MIC=8µg/ml)
